subject: Monaco Grand Prix
lead_paragraph: Jackie Stewart, the triple Formula One world champion who won the Monaco Grand Prix in 1966, 1971 and 1973, talks to Brad Spurgeon about Monaco and the possible advent of an American team in the sport.
snippet: Jackie Stewart, the triple Formula One world champion who won the Monaco Grand Prix in 1966, 1971 and 1973, talks to Brad Spurgeon about Monaco and the possible advent of an American team in the sport.
